description: Alitinity Clickhouse Operator metrics exported by Monitoring Agent

panels.description: Number of Kafka active consumers
panels.title: Kafka active consumers

panels.description: Number of active Kafka consumers which have some partitions assigned.
panels.title: Kafka consumers with assignments

panels.description: Number of consumers which are currently used by direct or background reads (MVs)
panels.title: Kafka consumers in use

panels.description: Number of partitions Kafka tables currently assigned to
panels.title: Kafka Assigned Partitions

panels.description:
KafkaConsumerErrors, "Number of errors reported by librdkafka during polls"

KafkaProducerFlushes, "Number of explicit flushes to Kafka producer"
panels.title: Kafka consumer Errors

panels.description: Number of partition assignments (the first stage of consumer group rebalance)
panels.title: Kafka rebalance assignments

panels.description: Number of partition revocations (the first stage of consumer group rebalance)
panels.title: Kafka rebalance revocations

panels.description: Number of partition relabance errors (the first stage of consumer group rebalance)
panels.title: Kafka rebalance  errors

panels.description: KafkaCommits, "Number of successful commits of consumed offsets to Kafka (normally should be the same as KafkaBackgroundReads)"
panels.title: Kafka commits

panels.description: KafkaCommitFailures, "Number of failed commits of consumed offsets to Kafka (usually is a sign of some data duplication)"(due to rebalances / errors or similar reasons). Those rows will be consumed again after the rebalance.
panels.title: Kafka commit failures

panels.description: Number of background reads currently working (populating materialized views from Kafka)
panels.title: Kafka Background Reads

panels.description: Number of kafka read messages from librdkafka to ClickHouse
panels.title: Kafka messages read

panels.description: Number of Kafka messages polled  from librdkafka to ClickHouse
panels.title: Kafka messages polled

panels.description: Number of Kafka messages failed from librdkafka to ClickHouse
panels.title: Kafka messages failed

panels.description: │ KafkaLibrdkafkaThreads       │     0 │ Number of active librdkafka threads                                                     │
panels.title: Kafka LibrdKafka Threads

panels.description: Number of rows parsed from Kafka messages
panels.title: Kafka rows read

panels.description: Number of parsed rows which were later rejected (due to rebalances / errors or similar reasons). Those rows will be consumed again after the rebalance.
panels.title: Kafka rows rejected

panels.description: KafkaBackgroundReads, "Number of background reads populating materialized views from Kafka since server start"
panels.title: Kafka background reads

panels.description: Number of currently running inserts to Kafka
panels.title: Kafka Writes by producers (Current INSERTs)

panels.description: KafkaWrites, "Number of writes (inserts) to Kafka tables "
panels.title: Kafka writes (INSERTs) by producers

panels.description: KafkaProducerErrors, "Number of errors during producing the messages to Kafka"
panels.title: Kafka producer errors

panels.description: Kafka Producers active
panels.title: Kafka active producers

panels.description: KafkaMessagesProduced, "Number of messages produced to Kafka"
panels.title: Kafka messages produced

panels.description: KafkaRowsWritten, "Number of rows inserted into Kafka tables"
panels.title: Kafka rows written by producers

title: Kafka Dashboard
